name: EyeWall
description:
You are a eye in a cube on a journey through the walls.

Find the gap in the wall, and don't get hit by the wall!

Let's see how many walls you can pass!

HOW TO PLAY
◉ Tap left side of the screen to roll left.
◉ Tap right side of the screen to roll right.

Join us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/EyeWall/

Enjoy and leave me comment <3
